document_data.mainbody:
ord Alexi Dauntinghorn was a member of the noble Dauntinghorn family of Cormyr in the 14 century DR.
In the , Lord Alexi attended King Azoun Obarskyr IVs birthday feast, hosted by Lord Partic Thistle at Thistleflame Keep. He was accompanied there by Lady Tremayne Dauntinghorn.
